name: Joyful Drift
description:
Joyful Drift is a 2D shoot'em up were you slowly lose control of your ship as the game progresses.

CONTROLS:

  • aim with the mouse
  • shoot with the left click
  • move with W or Z
  • shield with right click or space

This game was made for the GMTK2020 Jam in 48 hour by a team of two people:

  • Abel Lefel Fernandez - Game Design, Programming, Music
  • Alexandre Charvin - Game Design, Art

Have fun as you drift OUT OF CONTROL !
